summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6032 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Holman Addition to Ballard, being the alley between West 69th Street and West 70th Street from 32nd Avenue Northwest to approximately 385 feet west thereof; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 81857, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
